creator: ackava@neurospeech.com
text:
I have deployed various projects on 3.x versions of tomcat, many developers 
sheldom using web.xml and call servlets using /servlet/ClassName method.

For example,
ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/MyFirstServlet.class exists,
To access this servlet we type in address bar of browser following:
http://address:8080/servlet/MyFirstServlet?parameters....

This was working earlier,
As soon as we upgraded our server with 4.1.27, this thing stopped working, and 
web.xml in this version is mandetory? also web.xml does not take directories in 
url-pattern.

Various places the links are written as /servlet/ServletClass , almost 
impossible to change on various projects, we decided to write web.xml 
containing path /servlet/ServletClass rather then only ServletClass , but it 
fails this way. Tomcat doesnt load Virtual Host, website is not available. And 
it gives following error.
